channel.title: VMworld on davidstamen.com
channel.description: Recent content in VMworld on davidstamen.com

item.title: VMworld EU 2019 - vSphere Lifecycle Sessions
item.description: VMworld US has wrapped up and now its time to focus on VMworld EU! Let’s jump in and find out what’s going on in the world of vSphere Lifecycle. Check out this post to see how I will be engaging with our customers at this years events!

item.title: VMworld 2019 - Sessions and Events
item.description: VMworld US 2019 is just around the corner and the session acceptance emails have just been sent out. Check out this post to see how I will be engaging with our customers at this years events!

item.title: VMworld EU - Sessions and Events
item.description: VMworld EU is around the corner and just like VMworld US I will be quite busy! If you are interested in where to find me, look below to see some my planned sessions.

item.title: VMworld 2018 - Sessions and Events
item.description: This will be my first VMworld attending as an employee and quite a bit of things will be going on. Just in case anyone was interesting in vSphere Upgrades I wanted to share out some key sessions that I recommend including my own.
